title: type
description: Just when you think you can't go another step, you finish that foot race - and raise money for your local hospital! ADVANCE TO GO. COLLECT $200.

title: type
description: Your fuzzy friends at the animal shelter will be thankful for your donation. PAY $50.

title: type
description: You organize a group to clean up your town's walking path. COLLECT $50.

title: type
description: You help your neighbor bring in her groceries. She makes you lunch to say thanks! COLLECT $20.

title: type
description: You spend the day playing games with kids at a local children's hospital. COLLECT $100.

title: type
description: You help your neighbors clean up their yards after a big storm. COLLECT $200.

title: type
description: You set aside time every week to hang out with your elderly neighbor - you've heard some amazing stories! COLLECT $100.

title: type
description: You help build a new school playground - then you get to test the slide! COLLECT $100.

title: type
description: You organize a block party so people on your street can get to know each other. COLLECT $10 FROM EACH PLAYER.

title: type
description: You volunteer at a blood drive. There are free cookies! COLLECT $10.

title: type
description: You organize a bake sale for your local school. COLLECT $25.

title: type
description: You buy a few bags of cookies from that school bake sale. Yum! PAY $50.

title: type
description: You go to the local school's car wash fundraiser - but you forget to close your windows! PAY $100.

title: type
description: You should have volunteered for that home improvement project - you would have learned valuable skills! FOR EACH HOUSE YOU OWN, PAY $40. FOR EACH HOTEL YOU OWN, PAY $115.

title: type
description: Blasting music late at night? Your neighbors do not approve. GO TO JAIL. GO DIRECTLY TO JAIL. DO NOT PASS GO. DO NOT COLLECT $200.

title: type
description: You rescue a puppy - and you feel rescued, too! GET OUT OF JAIL FREE. This card may be kept until needed, traded, or sold.
